name: AeroDynamic Aviation - Monterey
about: AeroDynamic Aviation, based at Monterey Regional Airport, is a premier flight school dedicated to teaching traditional stick-and-rudder flying skills. With a legacy spanning over 62 years, our school offers comprehensive training from Sport and Private Pilot to Instrument, Commercial, Multi-Engine, ATP, and CFI certifications. We also specialize in tailwheel transitions, aerobatics, and mountain flying. Our fleet includes Cessna 172 and 182 aircraft, among others. Our award-winning instructors are committed to building skilled and confident pilots. We provide ground and flight training tailored to your schedule and budget, ensuring a safe and enjoyable learning experience. Join our family of pilots and discover the joy of flying with AeroDynamic Aviation.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
